mapper.select: select b.bno, m.mno as member_no, h.hno as hospital_no, h.name as hospital_name, h.addr as hospital_address, h.tel as hospital_tel from pet_hp_bookmark b inner join pet_user m on m.mno = b.mno inner join pet_hp h on h.hno = b.hno where m.mno = #{no} order by h.name
select b.bno, m.mno as member_no, h.hno as hospital_no from pet_hp_bookmark b inner join pet_user m on m.mno = b.mno inner join pet_hp h on h.hno = b.hno where m.mno = #{no}

select b.bno, m.mno as member_no, h.hno as hospital_no from pet_hp_bookmark b inner join pet_user m on m.mno = b.mno inner join pet_hp h on h.hno = b.hno where m.mno = ${member} and h.hno = ${hospital}
